ComicInfo.Penciller: Carlos Silva,Dario Brizuela,Chris Giarrusso,Dario Brizuela,Carlos Silva,Chris Giarrusso
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hulk Sunburn: All the Hulks are red after laying out by the pool.
Hulk Bubblegum: Who can blow the biggest bubble?
Hulk Carnival: The Hulks break the Ferris wheel.
Hulk Library: The Hulks are too noisy for the library.
Hulk Bakery: Red Hulk and Blue Hulk ruin Green Hulk's first day working at the bakery.
Hulk Schoolbus: The Hulks get kicked off the school bus for getting everyone to throw things at the driver.
Hulk Skiing: Green Hulk and Red Hulk race down a slope which is too advanced for them.
Hulk Science: The Hulks don't follow directions in science class and their experiment turns out wrong.
Hulk Market: The Hulks race their shopping carts and make a mess.
Hulk Sleepover: Everyone wants all the covers and everyone else is hogging them.
Hulk Cat: Green Hulk finds a cat but it is too much for them to handle.
Hulk Camping: The Hulks don't know how to set up a tent.
Hulk Snow: The Hulks start a snowball fight with the wrong heroes.
Hulk Sniffles: Playing in puddles makes you catch a cold.
Hulk Rain: The Hulks go to the bakery to pick up Mama's pie order, but it's raining so they have to play in the puddles.
Hulk Dentist: Blue Hulk goes to the dentist and the other Hulks get in trouble for fooling around with the equipment.
Hulk Tonsils: Green Hulk has to have his tonsils out but it means he can eat lots of ice cream.
Hulk Date: When Red Hulk meets She-Hulk he wants to ask her out but her cousin Green Hulk says no.
Hulk Movie: The Hulks talk too much at the movies which makes everyone else mad.
Hulk Gym: The Thing plays a trick on Green Hulk by speeding up his treadmill.
HulkDonald's: Green Hulk has to work at HulkDonald's to pay for the damage he caused.
Hulk Driving: Green Hulk fails his driving test when he smashes the car into the HulkDonald's restaurant.
Hulk Dog: The Hulks want a pet but they mistake Wolverine for a dog.
Hulk Chef: The Hulks don't follow directions in the kitchen and bake up a cake monster.
Hulk Mama: Green Hulk takes the other Hulks home to meet his mom.
Hulk Beach: Red Hulk and Blue Hulk bury Green Hulk in the sand while he is sleeping.
Hulk Ice: The Hulks are cold so they build a fire, but Iceman puts it out because it's melting his ice.
Hulk Airport: The Hulks ride a baggage cart and make a mess.
Hulk Web: Green Hulk and Spider-Man get into an argument about their cartoon theme songs.
Hulk Zoo: Green Hulk frees all the animals in the zoo, then gets locked up himself.
Hulk Splash: Who can make the bigger splash in the pool?
Hulk Art Class: The Hulks get splattered with paint after a fight and can't tell which is which.
ComicInfo.Title: Hulk Sunburn; Hulk Bubblegum; Hulk Carnival; Hulk Library; Hulk Bakery; Hulk Schoolbus; Hulk Skiing; Hulk Science; Hulk Market; Hulk Sleepover; Hulk Cat; Hulk Camping; Hulk Snow; Hulk Sniffles; Hulk Rain; Hulk Dentist; Hulk Tonsils; Hulk Date; Hulk Movie; Hulk Gym; HulkDonald's; Hulk Driving; Hulk Dog; Hulk Chef; Hulk Mama; Hulk Beach; Hulk Ice; Hulk Airport; Hulk Web; Hulk Zoo; Hulk Splash; Hulk Art Class
